title: Understanding Table Columns
text: To add a new column to a table in Excel, you need to understand how Excel recognizes table ranges.

title: Adding a Column Heading
text: When you add a new column heading, Excel automatically includes the adjacent column in the table's range. This is a key feature of Excel tables.

hintAnswer: add a new column heading, at which point Excel automatically adds the adjacent column to the table's range
title: Steps to Add a Column
text: What is the correct way to add a new column to an Excel table?
choices: add a new column heading, at which point Excel automatically adds the adjacent column to the table's range
add a new column by clicking 'add column'
wrap text in a cell to make it a column
